item.title: Releasing Soon! Learning Elastic Stack 6.0
item.author: Pranav Shukla
item.description:
The book Learning Elastic Stack 6.0 is available for pre-order. Here is what to expect from the book.

Elasticsearch has been at the forefront of the big data movement. Since its initial release in 2010, it has slowly but steadily evolved into a robust big data store. Elasticsearch has been

I have been working as a co-author on the book Learning Elastic Stack 6.0 with Packt Publishing. After nearly one year of writing, the book is ready and is available for pre-order online.
